description: This file defines the Bootstrap modal component (version 3.2.0), including the Modal class, its methods for showing, hiding, and managing modal dialogs, and the jQuery plugin interface for modal functionality.

classes.name: Modal
classes.description: Class representing the Bootstrap modal component, managing modal dialog behavior and transitions.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the modal between shown and hidden states.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Displays the modal dialog, handling focus, backdrop, and transition effects.

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Hides the modal dialog, removing focus and backdrop, with transition effects.

methods.name: enforceFocus
methods.description: Ensures that focus remains within the modal when it is open.

methods.name: escape
methods.description: Handles escape key press to close the modal if enabled.

methods.name: hideModal
methods.description: Completes the hiding process and triggers the hidden event.

methods.name: removeBackdrop
methods.description: Removes the modal backdrop element from DOM.

methods.name: backdrop
methods.description: Manages the creation and removal of the modal backdrop with optional animation.

methods.name: checkScrollbar
methods.description: Checks if scrollbar adjustments are needed when modal is shown.

methods.name: setScrollbar
methods.description: Adjusts body padding to account for scrollbar width when modal is open.

methods.name: resetScrollbar
methods.description: Resets body padding after modal is closed.

methods.name: measureScrollbar
methods.description: Measures the width of the scrollbar.
